mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zp_company_job_info
company_id,
typeId,
name,
report_object,
jobPositionLevelId,
zp_person_count,
expected_year_money_start,
expected_year_money_end,
work_term_start,
work_term_end,
down_team_person_count,
zp_require,
keyword_status,
sex,
educationId,
englishLevelId,
age_start,
age_end,
marital_id,
topSpecialty,
job_tempt_text,
job_tempt_item,
`desc`,
more_desc,
in_person,
in_datetime,
last_update_time,
is_delete,
zp_urgency_status_id,
area_id,
coord_x,
coord_y,
address,
#{companyId},
#{typeId},
#{name},
#{reportObject},
#{jobPositionLevelId},
#{zpPersonCount},
#{expectedYearMoneyStart},
#{expectedYearMoneyEnd},
#{workTermStart},

#{downTeamPersonCount},
#{zpRequire},

mapper.update:
UPDATE zp_company_job_info
company_id=#{companyId},
typeId=#{typeId},
name=#{name},
report_object=#{reportObject},
jobPositionLevelId=#{jobPositionLevelId},
zp_person_count=#{zpPersonCount},
expected_year_money_start=#{expectedYearMoneyStart},
expected_year_money_end=#{expectedYearMoneyEnd},
work_term_start=#{workTermStart},
work_term_end=#{workTermEnd},
down_team_person_count=#{downTeamPersonCount},
zp_require=#{zpRequire},
keyword_status=#{keywordStatus},
sex=#{sex},
educationId=#{educationId},
englishLevelId=#{englishLevelId},
age_start=#{ageStart},
age_end=#{ageEnd},
marital_id=#{maritalId},
topSpecialty=#{topSpecialty},
job_tempt_text=#{jobTemptText},
job_tempt_item=#{jobTemptItem},
`desc`=#{desc},
more_desc=#{moreDesc},
in_person=#{inPerson},
in_datetime=#{inDatetime},
last_update_time=#{lastUpdateTime},
is_delete=#{isDelete},
zp_urgency_status_id=#{zpUrgencyStatusId},
area_id=#{areaId},
coord_x=#{coordX},
coord_y=#{coordY},
address=#{address},
WHERE job_id=#{jobId}
mapper.select:
SELECT cji.job_id, cji.company_id, cji.typeId, cji.name, cji.report_object, cji.jobPositionLevelId, cji.zp_person_count, cji.expected_year_money_start, cji.expected_year_money_end, cji.work_term_start, cji.work_term_end, cji.down_team_person_count, cji.zp_require, cji.keyword_status, cji.sex, cji.educationId, cji.englishLevelId, cji.age_start, cji.age_end, cji.marital_id, cji.topSpecialty, cji.job_tempt_text, cji.job_tempt_item, cji.desc, cji.more_desc, cji.in_person, cji.in_datetime, cji.last_update_time, cji.is_delete,
cjdk.key_id as k_key_id ,
cjdk.job_id as k_job_id,
cjdk.keyword as k_keyword,
cjdk.proportion as k_proportion,
cji.zp_urgency_status_id, cji.coord_x, cji.coord_y, cji.address, cji.area_id,
ci.company_id AS companyAreaId, a.username as inPersonName, ci.name as companyName FROM zp_company_job_info cji LEFT JOIN zp_company_job_demand_keys cjdk ON cji.job_id= cjdk.job_id LEFT JOIN zp_company_info ci ON cji.company_id =ci.company_id Left join account a on a.account_id = cji.in_person
WHERE cji.job_id=#{jobId}
